subjects.name: Web Design
subjects.description: An in-depth guide to mastering web design from fundamentals to advanced techniques.

topics.name: Introduction to Web Design
topics.description: Basics of web design, including principles, tools, and workflows.

topics.name: HTML Fundamentals
topics.description: HTML basics, elements, attributes, and semantic markup.

topics.name: Advanced HTML
topics.description: HTML5 features, multimedia, forms, and accessibility.

topics.name: CSS Fundamentals
topics.description: CSS basics, selectors, properties, and box model.

topics.name: Advanced CSS Techniques
topics.description: Flexbox, Grid, animations, transitions, and transformations.

topics.name: Responsive Web Design
topics.description: Creating responsive designs using media queries and breakpoints.

topics.name: CSS Preprocessors
topics.description: Introduction to Sass and Less for advanced styling.

topics.name: Tailwind CSS
topics.description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.

topics.name: Bootstrap Framework
topics.description: Creating responsive layouts with Bootstrap components.

topics.name: Flowbite Components
topics.description: Using Flowbite for pre-built components and Tailwind integration.

topics.name: Introduction to JavaScript
topics.description: JavaScript basics: syntax, variables, and control structures.

topics.name: Advanced JavaScript
topics.description: ES6+ features, asynchronous programming, and APIs.

topics.name: DOM Manipulation and Events
topics.description: Manipulating the DOM, event handling, and event delegation.

topics.name: JavaScript Frameworks Overview
topics.description: Introduction to popular frameworks like React, Vue, and Angular.

topics.name: jQuery Fundamentals
topics.description: Using jQuery for simplified DOM manipulation and animations.

topics.name: Advanced jQuery Techniques
topics.description: jQuery plugins, AJAX, and event handling.

topics.name: Introduction to Web Animations
topics.description: Creating animations with CSS, JavaScript, and GSAP.

topics.name: Web Performance Optimization
topics.description: Techniques for optimizing web performance, including lazy loading and caching.

topics.name: Cross-Browser Compatibility
topics.description: Ensuring compatibility across different browsers and devices.

topics.name: Accessibility in Web Design
topics.description: Designing accessible web content for all users.

topics.name: SEO Fundamentals
topics.description: Basics of Search Engine Optimization for web design.

topics.name: Web Security Basics
topics.description: Introduction to web security, HTTPS, and best practices.

topics.name: Introduction to Web Development Tools
topics.description: Using development tools like VSCode, Git, and browser dev tools.

topics.name: Advanced CSS Frameworks
topics.description: Exploring Bulma, Foundation, and Materialize for advanced styling.

topics.name: Modern JavaScript Libraries
topics.description: Using libraries like Lodash, Moment.js, and D3.js.

topics.name: Web Design for Mobile
topics.description: Best practices for designing mobile-first websites.

topics.name: Web Design Trends
topics.description: Exploring modern trends like Neumorphism, Glassmorphism, and Dark Mode.

topics.name: Introduction to JAMstack
topics.description: Building static sites with modern tools like Gatsby, Next.js, and Hugo.

topics.name: Version Control with Git
topics.description: Using Git for version control and collaboration.

topics.name: Deploying Web Projects
topics.description: Deploying websites using Netlify, Vercel, and traditional servers.

topics.name: Web Design Project
topics.description: Capstone project to create a fully functional website.
